005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
011
012import java.math.BigInteger;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016public interface IIntegerItem extends IDecimalItem {
017
018  @SuppressWarnings("null")
019  @NonNull
020  IIntegerItem ONE = valueOf(BigInteger.ONE);
021  @SuppressWarnings("null")
022  @NonNull
023  IIntegerItem ZERO = valueOf(BigInteger.ZERO);
024  @SuppressWarnings("null")
025  @NonNull
026  IIntegerItem NEGATIVE_ONE = valueOf(BigInteger.ONE.negate());
027
028  /**
029   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
030   *
031   * @param value
032   *          a string representing an integer value
033   * @return the item
034   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
035   *           if the provided value is not an integer
036   */
037  @NonNull
038  static IIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
039    try {
040      return valueOf(new BigInteger(value));
041    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
042      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(null,
043          ex.getMessage(),
044          ex);
045    }
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Construct a new integer item using the provided {@code value}.
050   *
051   * @param value
052   *          a long value
053   * @return the new item
054   */
055  @NonNull
056  static IIntegerItem valueOf(int value) {
057    @SuppressWarnings("null")
058    @NonNull BigInteger bigInteger = BigInteger.valueOf(value);
059    return valueOf(bigInteger);
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Construct a new integer item using the provided {@code value}.
064   *
065   * @param value
066   *          a long value
067   * @return the new item
068   */
069  @NonNull
070  static IIntegerItem valueOf(long value) {
071    @SuppressWarnings("null")
072    @NonNull BigInteger bigInteger = BigInteger.valueOf(value);
073    return valueOf(bigInteger);
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Construct a new integer item using the provided {@code value}.
078   *
079   * @param value
080   *          an integer value
081   * @return the new item
082   */
083  @NonNull
084  static IIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull BigInteger value) {
085    int signum = value.signum();
086
087    IIntegerItem retval;
088    if (signum == -1) { // negative
089      retval = new IntegerItemImpl(value);
090    } else if (signum == 0) { // zero
091      retval = INonNegativeIntegerItem.valueOf(value);
092    } else { // positive
093      retval = IPositiveIntegerItem.valueOf(value);
094    }
095    return retval;
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
100   *
101   * @param item
102   *          the item to cast
103   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
104   *         cast to this type
105   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
106   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
107   */
108  @NonNull
109  static IIntegerItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
110    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.INTEGER.cast(item);
111  }
112
113  @Override
114  IIntegerItem abs();
115
116  @Override
117  default IIntegerItem ceiling() {
118    return this;
119  }
120
121  @Override
122  default IIntegerItem floor() {
123    return this;
124  }
125
126  @Override
127  default IIntegerItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
128    return valueOf(cast(item).asInteger());
129  }
130
131  @Override
132  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
133    return compareTo(cast(item));
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * Compares this value with the argument.
138   *
139   * @param item
140   *          the item to compare with this value
141   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
142   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
143   */
144  default int compareTo(IIntegerItem item) {
145    return asInteger().compareTo(item.asInteger());
146  }
147}
